amendment.description: Amendment allows the Department of the Treasury to support Cuban membership in international financial institutions once a transitional government is in power in Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to allow the Department of the Treasury to support Cuban membership in international financial institutions once a transitional government is in power in Havana.

action.text: Wynn amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
